title: Coronavirus journey: The 'last cruise ship on Earth' finally comes home
description: From political storms to presidential pleas, it has been quite a journey for the MSC Magnifica.
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 The MSC Magnifica's world cruise was supposed to last 117 days, before being cut short
The three last cruise ships still sailing will dock today. One of them - the MSC Magnifica - has had an odyssey like no other.
